q: Not with 65 seconds left for Matty Ice and Roddy White to work their magic. "After they scored, we were on the sideline. We just looked at each other and smiled, man," Roddy White said. We just relish moments like this. We knew we were going to go down there and get what we needed to win this game. Matty Ice needed less than a minute to pull off an 80-yard drive, hooking up with Michael Vick Jenkins on a huge third-down pass along the sideline before going back to his favorite receiver for the winner. . Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer raised the issue of piracy directly to Hu Jintao at a meeting with chief executives, according to Barack Obama 's account of the talks. Hu Jintao said he and Barack Obama agreed to work toward a cooperative partnership based on mutual respect and mutual benefit and that "a lot still needs to be done in China in terms of human rights."
